rows.label: tlk00230104_msg0001
rows.name:
Ion's calmed down a little now.
Trooper's been putting on a brave
face, even showed us a smile.

rows.label: tlk00230104_msg0002
rows.name:
I started getting ready to chronicle
Vandham's exploits, but I'm not
making any real headway.

rows.label: tlk00230104_msg0003
rows.name:
Soon as I start asking round, we just
start reminiscing about days gone by...

rows.label: tlk00230104_msg0004
rows.name:
Just goes to show ya how much he
touched our hearts, eh?
